channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Prime Video Sucks for Anime
item.description: The Amazon streamer's hopes of being anime’s go-to hub feel hollow when its track record reads like a cautionary tale.

item.title: Drawing in 3D with the Logitech Muse for Apple Vision Pro is so much harder than I thought — and I never want to stop
item.description: Apple's Vision Pro finally has a proper drawing stylus, but figuring out how to draw in 3D is a far greater challenge.

item.title: The AI security nightmare is here and it looks suspiciously like lobster
item.description: A hacker tricked a popular AI coding tool into installing OpenClaw - the viral, open-source AI agent OpenClaw that "actually does things" - absolutely everywhere. Funny as a stunt, but a sign of what to come as more and more people let autonomous software use their computers on their behalf. The hacker took advantage of […]

item.title: Here are my favorite things from Toy Fair 2026
item.description: Toy Fair 2026 just wrapped earlier this week and while I would have liked to spend even more time there, I have my own kids (and all their toys and trinkets) to look after. That said, there were a ton of cool new products on display at the Javits Center in New York City that set the stage for the rest of the year, so here's a quick look at some of the most interesting releases from the largest toy show in the Western Hemisphere. Transformers: The Movie 40th anniversary figures ($28 to $60)To celebrate the 40th anniversary of Transformers: The Movie, Hasbro is launching an apology tour to make ...

item.title: Baseus’ retractable, 6-in-1 travel adapter is on sale for its lowest price to date
item.description: Packing multiple charging adapters can quickly eat up space, which is why an all-in-one travel adapter like the Baseus EnerCore CG11 makes for a good investment. The travel-friendly accessory works in most countries and lets you charge several devices at once, and right now, Amazon is offering it for $24.95 ($45 off) — its lowest […]

item.title: As browser wars heat up, Chrome adds new productivity features
item.description: Split View, PDF annotations and 'Save to Chrome' features come to the Chrome browser.

item.title: La Nasa retient son souffle : la mission habitée vers la Lune suspendue à un test cette nuit !
item.description: La fusée SLS qui doit lancer la mission Artemis II vers la Lune s'est lancée dans un nouveau test crucial avant le décollage. Le premier essai avait échoué il y a quelques semaines, et cette fois, la Nasa espère mettre tous les feux au vert.

item.title: Massive global data breach sees over a billion records exposed - here's what we know so far
item.description: IDMerit database exposed one billion personal records across 26 countries.

item.title: Reddit is testing a new AI search feature for shopping
item.description: A small group of users in the U.S. will start to see search results that include interactive product carousels with pricing, images, and direct where-to-buy links.

item.title: Texas is suing TP-Link over its ties to China
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton is suing TP-Link over claims that the router-maker is misleading customers about its ties to China. In a lawsuit filed this week, Paxton claims TP-Link is "masking its Chinese connections," while serving as "an open window for Chinese-sponsored threat actors and Chinese intelligence agencies." TP-Link was founded in China, but […]...

item.title: Eileen Gu, most-decorated female freestyle skier in Olympics history, shuts down reporter’s ‘ridiculous’ question about her performance
item.description: You can be the most successful female athlete in your sport, and still have your accomplishments diminished. Eileen Gu, the 22-year-old Chinese freeskier who just became the most decorated Olympian in women’s freestyle skiing, stood up for herself when speaking to a reporter at a press conference this week. In doing so, the skier unwittingly gave women everywhere an absolute masterclass in knowing their worth. ...

item.title: Cet écran PC gaming incurvé Samsung 4K de 37″ à 165 Hz bradé à -42 % est un bon petit cadeau pour les joueurs PC exigeants
item.description: Le Samsung Odyssey G7 G75F est un bel écran gaming incurvé qui a tout ce qu'il faut pour rendre votre expérience la plus immersive possible contre 689,99 euros au lieu de 1 199,99 euros.

item.title: Gemini 3.1 Pro : Google déploie un modèle plus à l’aise avec les problèmes complexes
item.description: Si Gemini vous semble un peu plus finaud depuis aujourd'hui, c'est normal : Google vient en effet de déployer Gemini 3.1 Pro pour les développeurs et le grand public. Le modèle se veut plus performant, en particulier sur les problèmes complexes à résoudre.

item.title: Indiana Jones Exists in the ‘Shrinking’ Universe, But Who Plays Him?
item.description: The latest episode of the Apple TV show gave Harrison Ford a very meta moment, and we loved it.

item.title: The big red flag working parents look for in a job
item.description: A new study from national childcare provider KinderCare finds that one in three employers do not offer any childcare benefits—but 85% of parents surveyed describe those benefits as “essential.” For all the talk from employers who claim to understand the needs of working parents, childcare benefits remain elusive in many workplaces.

item.title: Reese’s Peanut Butter Cup inventor’s grandson says the candy has gotten worse in this specific way. Social media agrees
item.description: Brad Reese just took a swing at Hershey, and consumers are backing him up. The Reese’s brand just took a hit from an unlikely source: the descendant of its founder.

item.title: Des substances toxiques détectées dans tous les casques audio testés
item.description: Une étude menée par le projet européen ToxFree LIFE for All révèle la présence généralisée de produits chimiques dangereux dans les casques et écouteurs de grandes marques comme Bose, Samsung, Sennheiser et bien d’autres. Les 81 modèles analysés contenaient des substances liées à des risques de cancer, de troubles hormonaux et de problèmes de développement neurologique, rien de moins... ...

item.title: Ring could be planning to expand Search Party feature beyond dogs
item.description: Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff has indicated that the company's controversial Search Party feature might not always be just for lost dogs, according to emails obtained by 404 Media. A creepy surveillance tool being used to surveil. Who could have predicted that? "I believe that the foundation we created with Search Party, first for finding dogs, will end up becoming one of the most important pieces of tech and innovation to truly unlock the impact of our mission," Siminoff wrote in an email to staffers. "You can now see a future where we are able to zero out crime in neighborhoods. So many things to ...

item.title: Federal Reserve Says Prediction Markets Are a Valuable Tool for Policymakers
item.description: If you're not a Federal Reserve economist, you should probably still be wary of Kalshi.

item.title: Ring says its leaked plan to 'zero out crime in neighborhoods' doesn't mean mass surveillance
item.description: Ring cameras could be used to track a lot more than lost dogs, a leaked email suggests. But the company has hit back at claims that it means mass surveillance.

item.title: Audi dote sa nouvelle RS 5 hybride d’une technologie électrique inédite pour en faire la reine de la glisse
item.description: Avec son moteur V6 2,9 litres bi-turbo de 639 ch couplé à un moteur électrique, la nouvelle Audi RS 5 s'attaque à un exercice périlleux : celui de l'hybridation d'un monument de l'auto sportive. Un pari techniquement séduisant, d'autant plus que la voiture se dote d'une technologie déjà vue sur plusieurs modèles électriques un tantinet sportifs.

item.title: Apple TV’s The Hunt finally has a premiere date
item.description: The Hunt - Apple TV's new French-language drama that was previously put on indefinite hold following concerns about plagiarism - has been given a solid release date. Today, Apple announced that The Hunt, which was produced by French studio Gaumont and directed by Cédric Anger, is set to premiere on March 4th. The news comes […]

item.title: YouTube is bringing the Gemini-powered 'Ask' button to TVs
item.description: YouTube's "Ask" button is making its way to the living room. The Gemini-powered feature is now rolling out as an experiment on smart TVs, gaming consoles and streaming devices. 9to5Google first spotted a Google support page announcing the change.Like on mobile devices and desktop, the feature is essentially a Gemini chatbot trained on each video's content. Selecting that "Ask" button will bring up a series of canned prompts related to the content. Alternatively, you can use your microphone to ask questions about it in your own words.The "Ask about this video" feature on desktopYouTubeGoogle sa...

item.title: AdGuard's Windows VPN upgrade prioritizes usability for all
item.description: New AdGuard VPN update makes Windows app screen reader-friendly. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: Avowed's first anniversary update arrives on PS5 today, but there are no major PS5 Pro enhancements to look forward to
item.description: Obsidian Entertainment has released the Anniversary Update for Avowed to celebrate the game's first birthday, along with the long-awaited PlayStation 5 edition.

item.title: Pour « sauver » les Européens de la « censure » de Bruxelles, l’administration Trump développerait un portail VPN
item.description: L'administration Trump, pour contrer « la censure en Europe », serait en train de développer un portail en ligne agissant comme un VPN. L'objectif : permettre aux citoyens du Vieux continent et à d'autres d'accéder aux contenus illicites ou préjudiciables proscrits par la règlementation européenne sur le Numérique, ou d'autres lois locales. L'information n'a pas été confirmée officiellement....

item.title: The DJI Osmo Pocket 3 is on sale for a record-low price at Amazon — save $64 at Amazon
item.description: The DJI Osmo Pocket 3 is on sale for $439, down from the normal price of $499. That's a 13% discount.

item.title: Rivian rolls out an Apple Watch app with vehicle controls and digital key support
item.description: Rivian suggests that vehicle owners can leave their phone at home (or perhaps in a glove box) and instead control some aspects of their EV using a new Apple Watch app. With a tap of your watch, you can unlock and lock the doors, sound the alarm and vent the windows. After the digital key is set up, R1S and R1T Gen 2 owners can unlock their vehicle automatically simply by walking up to it thanks to the passive car key feature.It's possible to set the cabin temperature and a target state of charge by turning the digital crown on an Apple Watch. You also can choose four quick controls to put fron...

item.title: Amazon shuts down Blue Jay warehouse robot project after less than a year
item.description: Six months ago, Amazon announced a new robot initiative for its warehouses. That is no longer happening.

item.title: This high-performance creators laptop is the deal of 2026 so far — the Alienware 16 Aurora with Intel Core 7 240H and Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 graphics is $300 off right now
item.description: Powerful Alienware 16 Aurora creators laptop with RTX 5060 and 16GB DDR5 RAM gets huge $300 discount.

item.title: The RAM crisis is completely warping my usual PC-building advice, so here's a fresh priority list for anyone looking to build or upgrade a PC
item.description: I used to recommend RAM and SSDs as a wallet-friendly PC upgrade, but the RAM crisis has left that advice dead in the water — here's what to do instead.

item.title: Google Maps looks different for some users in big change
item.description: Google has reportedly rolled out a major change for Maps users who aren't logged in to an account.

item.title: Crime 101s Chris Hemsworth and Halle Berry play our new mash-up game
item.description: Can you crack Mashable's latest puzzle? "Crime 101"s Chris Hemsworth and Halle Berry play our new mash-up game.

item.title: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless : on n’a jamais vu un prix aussi bas pour ce casque gaming haut de gamme de qualité
item.description: Faker, Rain ou encore James Baldwin jouent avec le SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless, un casque gaming multiplateforme que vous retrouvez pour 219,99 euros sur Amazon au lieu de 379,99 euros.

item.title: Les Redmi Buds 8 Active seront-ils des concurrents sérieux aux modèles d’entrée de gamme ?
item.description: Xiaomi s'apprête à commercialiser les Redmi Buds 8 Active, une nouvelle paire d'écouteurs sans fil positionnée sous le modèle Lite lancé en janvier 2026. Une fuite révèle l'ensemble des caractéristiques techniques, le design et le prix de ces écouteurs qui adoptent un format ouvert semi-intra-auriculaire.

item.title: The New ‘Toy Story 5’ Trailer Reminds Us Tech Is a 4-Letter Word
item.description: Andrew Stanton wrote and directed the latest in Pixar's much-loved animated franchise, starring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, and series newcomer Greta Lee.

item.title: CT Scans Reveal Gruesome Details of Inca Child Sacrifices
item.description: New research investigates the centuries-old remains of sacrificial victims recovered from volcanoes in Peru.

item.title: Hackers claim breach of Adidas systems - but it says a third-party is the real victim
item.description: Was Adidas hacked? Or was it a third-party.

item.title: Struggling to dial in your coffee grinder? Baratza's new stepless Encore ESP Pro could be exactly what you need
item.description: Dialing in your grinder just got easier, whichever brewing style you prefer.

item.title: YouTube teste un bouton Gemini pour « discuter » avec les vidéos
item.description: YouTube veut faire la causette. La plateforme teste actuellement un bouton Gemini qui permet au spectateur de poser des questions sur le contenu d'une vidéo. Reste à savoir s'il s'agit d'une bonne idée ou pas…

item.title: West Virginia sues Apple for allegedly letting child abuse spread in iCloud
item.description: West Virginia has filed a lawsuit against Apple, accusing the company of allowing the distribution and storage of child sexual abuse material (CSAM) in iCloud. In a lawsuit filed on Thursday, West Virginia Attorney General JB McCuskey claims that by abandoning a CSAM detection system in favor of end-to-end encryption, iCloud has become a "secure […]...
